name: Drow
description: Drow descended from dark-skinned elves driven underground.

traits.name: Drow Magic
traits.description: Dancing Lights cantrip; Faerie Fire at 3rd level; Darkness at 5th level. Charisma is spellcasting ability.

traits.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
traits.description: Disadvantage on attacks and Perception in direct sunlight.
